    public getType(target: any): String source 

    import getType from 'uc-fun/src/getType.js'

    get data type string

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    target any

    Return:

    String

    data type

    Example:

     getType({})
 // => 'Object'

*  getType(1)
 // => 'Number'

    public isBigger(num: Number, standard: Number): Boolean source 

    import isBigger from 'uc-fun/src/isBigger.js'

    比较第一个参数是否大于第二个参数 （参数建议数字类型，也可以处理能转为数字类型的参数,例如string '10', null, new Date()）

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    num Number

    需要比较的数 eg:2
    standard Number

    被对比的数 eg:10

    Return:

    Boolean

    Example:

     isBigger(10,2)
 => true

 isBigger(1,new Date())
 => false

 isBigger('12','2')
 => true

    public isIdentityCard(number: Number | String): * source 

    import isIdentityCard from 'uc-fun/src/isIdentityCard.js'

    匹配所有身份证号 身份证校验码计算规则 https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E8%BA%AB%E4%BB%BD%E8%AF%81%E6%A0%A1%E9%AA%8C%E7%A0%81/3800388

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    number Number | String

    身份证号 /d{8}(0\d|10|11|12)([0-2]\d|30|31)\d{3}$/ 15位身份证号 /^\d{6}(18|19|20)\d{2}(0\d|10|11|12)([0-2]\d|30|31)\d{3}[\dXx]$/ 18位身份证号

    Return:

    *

    Example:

    https://any86.github.io/any-rule/ 常用正则大全
 isIdentityCard('622001790122123')
 => true

 isIdentityCard(610124199810283999)
 => true

 isIdentityCard('34052419800101001X')
  => true

    Example:

     isPhoneNumber(18202972982)

 => true

  => false

    public linearScale(from: number[], to: number[]): function(num: number): number source 

    import linearScale from 'uc-fun/src/linearScale.js'

    线性比例尺： 根据当前数据范围和目标数据范围，对数据 x 做线性映射，若 x 超出当前数据范围， 则取边界值

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    from number[]

    [min, max] 当前数据范围
    to number[]

    [min, max] 目标数据范围

    Return:

    function(num: number): number

    返回此工具函数

    Example:

     const scale = linearScale([0, 10], [0, 100]);
 scale(1) // => 10
 scale(-1) // => 0
 scale(10) // => 100
 scale(100) // => 100

=> Promise {<pending>}

    public stringEllipsis(str: String, len: Number): String source 

    import stringEllipsis from 'uc-fun/src/stringEllipsis.js'

    当字符超出一定长度后用省略号代替

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    str String

    需要处理的字符串
    len Number

    字符串长度限制

    Return:

    String

    处理后的字符串

    Example:

     stringEllipsis('aaabbb',3)
 => 'aaa...'

 stringEllipsis(()=>{},3)
 => ''

    public stringRealLen(str: String): Number source 

    import stringRealLen from 'uc-fun/src/stringRealLen.js'

    计算字符串的真实长度， 英文 1 个字节， 中文两个字节

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    str String

    需要被计算的字符串

    Return:

    Number

    字符串长度

    Example:

     stringRealLen('abc')
 => 3

 stringRealLen('中')
 => 2

 stringRealLen(() => {})
 => 0

    public timeFormat(rowDate: Date | String | number, fmt: String): String source 

    import timeFormat from 'uc-fun/src/timeFormat.js'

    format type by fmt

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    rowDate Date | String | number

    [date instance|date string|timestamp]
    fmt String

    eg:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

    Return:

    String

    formated date

    Example:

     timeformat('2018-10-10 10:30:20', 'MM/DD HH:mm)
 // => 10/10 10:30

 const date = new Date('2018-10-10 10:30:20')
 timeformat(date, 'MM/DD HH:mm)
 // => 10/10 10:30

 const date = new Date('2018-10-10 10:30:20')
 timeformat(date.getTime(), 'MM/DD HH:mm)
 // => 10/10 10:30

    public urlFormat(url: String): Object source 

    import urlFormat from 'uc-fun/src/urlFormat.js'

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    url String

    [url string with '?'] eg 'https://www.jd.com?paramKey=paramValue' | '?paramKey=paramValue'

    Return:

    Object

    object

    Example:

     urlFormat(https://www.jd.com?key=value)
 => { key: 'value' }

 urlFormat()
 => {}

 urlFormat({})
 => Uncaught Error: the param of urlFormat must be string
